title: # 536 - Jamie O’Brien & ME
itunes:title: # 536 - Jamie O’Brien & ME
description:
Today, I sit down in Hawaii with professional surfer, Jamie O’Brien. We talk about his first time surfing at 3, injuries, taking control of his own career, his friend Poopies, and much more! 

 

Follow Jamie

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/whoisjob 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/JamieOBrienJOB 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Backbone. Get free access to over 350 console games and perks at playbackbone.com/bertcast
